title: Sheet Music: Opera Collection (updated)
description:
Sheet music, classical music, opera, operetta and some incidental music. All in *.pdf, sorted after composer and opera.

This is my collection of opera sheet music as of September 6th 2008. There are both scores and loose sheets. Most of the scores are rehersal partitures for voices and piano, but there are orchestral scores with or without voice parts as well. In some cases there are additional versions in other languages than the original. For one opera, Adam's Nixon in China there is only the libretto, but I decided to include that as well.

-----------------------------------
